column4: 1. How do i make sure my wifi works on startup - currently i have to go to network - all wifi settings wpa etc are correct dhcp/static both work yet wifi doesnt join that ap on startup i have to manually reload the network setting 2. how do i drag around items like trash on the bot taskbar - its unlocked but nothing wants to move i keep opening things i wish to re-arrange
gksudo is the same as sudo, sudo is cli, gksudo is for gui
